badges.name: Honey Badger
badges.description: Have at least one original Node.js-specific repo

badges.name: Narwhal
badges.description: Have at least one original repo where Clojure is the dominant language

badges.name: Forked
badges.description: Have a project valued enough to be forked by someone else

badges.name: Kona
badges.description: Have at least one original repo where CoffeeScript is the dominant language

badges.name: Walrus
badges.description: The walrus is no stranger to variety. Use at least 4 different languages throughout all your repos

badges.name: Mongoose
badges.description: Have at least one original repo where Ruby is the dominant language

badges.name: Charity
badges.description: Fork and commit to someone's open source project in need

badges.name: Bear
badges.description: Have at least one original repo where Objective-C is the dominant language
